Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Eggelston
ShortDescription: EB 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Eggelston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Eggelston.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
